charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking about
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a rumbling noise coming from
behind [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1101_020: Surprised, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] turned around...
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1101_030: and saw a Dugtrio burst out of the ground!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_050: Looks like my Dugtrio’s feeling pretty energetic.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_060:
Actually, we were just doing some training to
better adapt to the battle style on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_070:
But it looks like Dugtrio might’ve gotten a little
carried away.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_080:
I’ll be more careful next time...
*yawn*
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0401_100: Whoops. That was embarrassing just now...
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0402_120:
Haha... Yawning in front of someone is pretty
embarrassing.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_130:
I think I’ve been letting my passion for
astronomical observation cut into my sleeping
schedule a little too much lately, hehe.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_140:
As the head of Hokulani Observatory, I can’t help
but want to use all of my observations here in
my research!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_150:
Pasio and Alola have very different skies, each
with their own unique data set that I can record.
It’s why I never get tired of watching the stars!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_160:
Ah, but don’t worry. I do get regular sleep more
often than not.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_170:
But there are times when I think I’m on the verge
of discovering something truly amazing, only to
lose track of the time altogether.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_180:
That’s why I yawned earlier and why Dugtrio took
off and left me behind.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_190: Haha, looks like they’re at it again.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_200:
Dugtrio’s heads often compete with each other to
see which of them has the best metal whiskers.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_220: Yes, yes! You have a very original hairstyle!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_230: Your whiskers are large and elegant!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_240:
Oh! Your whiskers are looking just as soft and
stylish as ever!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_250:
Hmm... Dugtrio usually calms down after I
compliment his three heads.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0301_260: They look the same to me.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0401_270:
No, no, they’re quite different. They each have
their own distinct charm.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0402_290:
I suppose it’s not immediately obvious. You’ve got
to look closely to see their differences.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_300:
After spending every day with Dugtrio, you start
to notice what makes each head so unique.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_310:
The same could also be said of the stars in the
sky. They look the same at first glance, but they’re
actually quite different.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_320:
Different things coming together to create new and
beautiful landscapes.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_330:
That’s how I think of Dugtrio, too. Each head is
unique in its own way, but they come together to
create a force to be reckoned with!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0401_350:
Hmm, I suppose you’re right! From three sync
pairs, we create a single team!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0302_360: Like a battle using sync pairs!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0402_370:
Right! Each sync pair is different, but together
they create a power that’s greater than the sum
of its parts!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_380:
We could all learn from Dugtrio and work on our
teamwork.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_390: Oh? Looks like Dugtrio’s heads have calmed down.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_400:
I guess the worst of their whisker argument has
passed... *yawn*
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0301_410: You need to get some rest!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0401_420:
Ahaha... I suppose you’re right. I should go catch
a few z’s.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0302_430: Looks like you need a nap break!
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_0402_440:
Ahaha... I suppose you’re right. I should go get
some rest.
charaepi_ch0183_00_molayne/2301_1201_450:
After I’m good and rested, you’ll join me for some
training, right? I’d be glad if you did!
